languages.text: "О Деус Механикус, ниспошли импульс чудотворного преображения в ноосферный дух сей машины — и да воспрянет он вновь от священного инфосна!"

traits.locale_text: "О Деус Механикус, ниспошли импульс чудотворного преображения в ноосферный дух сей машины — и да воспрянет он вновь от священного инфосна!"

languages.text: "O Deus Mechanicus, bestow an impulse of miraculous transformation upon the Noospheric spirit of this machine — and may it rise again from its sacred datadream!"
languages.original_text: "О Деус Механикус, ниспошли импульс чудотворного преображения в ноосферный дух сей машины — и да воспрянет он вновь от священного инфосна!"

traits.locale_text: "O Deus Mechanicus, bestow an impulse of miraculous transformation upon the noospheric spirit of this machine — and may it rise again from its sacred datadream!"
"O Deus Mechanicus, bestow an impulse of miraculous transformation upon the noospheric spirit of this machine — and may it rise again from its sacred datadream!"
"O Deus Mechanicus, bestow an impulse of miraculous transformation upon the noospheric spirit of this machine — and may it rise again from its sacred datadream!"
"O Deus Mechanicus, bestow an impulse of miraculous transformation upon the Noospheric spirit of this machine — and may it rise again from its sacred datadream!"
"O Deus Mechanicus, bestow an impulse of miraculous transformation upon the Noospheric spirit of this machine — and may it rise again from its sacred datadream!"

languages.text: «¡Oh, Deus Mechanicus, confiere un impulso de transformación milagrosa al espíritu noosférico de esta máquina! ¡Que se alce de nuevo de su sagrado sueño de datos!».
languages.original_text: "O Deus Mechanicus, bestow an impulse of miraculous transformation upon the Noospheric spirit of this machine — and may it rise again from its sacred datadream!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, Deus Mechanicus, confiere un impulso de transformación milagrosa al espíritu noosférico de esta máquina! ¡Que se alce de nuevo de su sagrado sueño de datos!».

languages.text: 「あぁ、デウス・メカニクスよ。この機械の人類の精霊に奇跡的な変容のインパルスを授け給え。そして、神聖なるデータの夢から再び蘇えらせるのです！」
languages.original_text: "O Deus Mechanicus, bestow an impulse of miraculous transformation upon the Noospheric spirit of this machine — and may it rise again from its sacred datadream!"

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、デウス・メカニクスよ。この機械の人類の精霊に奇跡的な変容のインパルスを授け給え。そして、神聖なるデータの夢から再び蘇えらせるのです！」

languages.text: “噢，万机之神啊，请将奇迹的圣典赐予这台机器的通感之魂吧，愿它从神圣的数据梦境中苏醒！”
languages.original_text: "O Deus Mechanicus, bestow an impulse of miraculous transformation upon the Noospheric spirit of this machine — and may it rise again from its sacred datadream!"

traits.locale_text: “噢，万机之神啊，请将奇迹的圣典赐予这台机器的通感之魂吧，愿它从神圣的数据梦境中苏醒！”

languages.text: "O Deus Mechanicus, segne den noosphärischen Geist dieser Maschine mit einem Impuls der wundersamen Transformation ... auf dass er sich aus dem heiligen Datentraum erheben möge."
languages.original_text: "O Deus Mechanicus, bestow an impulse of miraculous transformation upon the Noospheric spirit of this machine — and may it rise again from its sacred datadream!"

traits.locale_text: "O Deus Mechanicus, segne den noosphärischen Geist dieser Maschine mit einem Impuls der wundersamen Transformation ... auf dass er sich aus dem heiligen Datentraum erheben möge."

languages.text: « Ô, Deus Mechanicus, accorde à l'esprit noosphérique de cette machine une impulsion de transformation miraculeuse, afin qu'elle s'éveille à nouveau de son rêve sacré ! »
languages.original_text: "O Deus Mechanicus, bestow an impulse of miraculous transformation upon the Noospheric spirit of this machine — and may it rise again from its sacred datadream!"

traits.locale_text: « Ô, Deus Mechanicus, accorde à l'esprit noosphérique de cette machine une impulsion de transformation miraculeuse, afin qu'elle s'éveille à nouveau de son rêve sacré ! »

languages.text: "Ey Deus Mechanicus, bu makinenin Noosferik ruhuna mucizevi dönüşümün bir impulsunu bahşet. Bahşet ki kutsal veri düşünden bir kez daha uyanabilsin!"
languages.original_text: "O Deus Mechanicus, bestow an impulse of miraculous transformation upon the Noospheric spirit of this machine — and may it rise again from its sacred datadream!"
